headline: GE Vernova Alliance Links Data Center Power, Grid Upgrades And Valuation Risks
summary: GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) has entered a multi year alliance with Xcel Energy that includes multi gigawatt capacity reservations for wind and gas turbines. The collaboration also covers grid modernization, artificial intelligence applications and joint R&D for power systems that serve data centers and the wider grid through the 2030s. Separately, the U.S. government has created a critical minerals reserve that is explicitly backed by GE Vernova, targeting stronger supply security for electrical...
